top_categories.workout_context: Holly Shelter Gravel Grinder’s coastal plain gravel drains energy reserves faster than the distance suggests — durability training bridges the gap.
Holly Shelter Gravel Grinder rewards athletes who can hold sustained power without blowing up — threshold is the engine that drives everything above Zone 2.
Holly Shelter Gravel Grinder’s coastal plain gravel, holly shelter game land demands rapid power changes — surge over obstacles, settle on smoother sections, repeat for hours.
Racing Holly Shelter Gravel Grinder isn’t just fitness — it’s pacing, fueling, and executing when conditions deteriorate. This workout practices the race itself.
The G-Spot zone (88–92% FTP) is where you’ll spend the hardest sustained miles of Holly Shelter Gravel Grinder. Make this intensity feel like home.
Holly Shelter Gravel Grinder’s coastal plain gravel and competitive field demand explosive aerobic capacity — the ability to respond to surges without blowing up.
Every session at Holly Shelter Gravel Grinder intensity builds on this aerobic foundation — the endurance base is the soil everything else grows in.
Over-unders train the lactate clearance you’ll need at Holly Shelter Gravel Grinder when surges push you above threshold and you have to recover while still riding hard.
Critical power determines how long you can sustain above-threshold efforts at Holly Shelter Gravel Grinder — a higher CP means more time in the red before failure.
The Norwegian double-threshold method builds the sustained power base for Holly Shelter Gravel Grinder — massive training stimulus without the recovery cost of VO2max work.
High-volume endurance builds the aerobic base that makes Holly Shelter Gravel Grinder’s race-day efforts sustainable rather than destructive.
Blended sessions combine endurance with intensity spikes — exactly what Holly Shelter Gravel Grinder’s coastal plain gravel delivers on race day.

race_overlay.nutrition: Target 40–60g carbs/hour for Holly Shelter Gravel Grinder’s 75 miles. Front-load calories in the first half. One bottle per hour minimum, more in heat.
race_overlay.terrain: Mixed terrain at Holly Shelter Gravel Grinder requires surface adaptability. Include weekly rides on coastal plain gravel to build confidence. Expect: coastal plain gravel, holly shelter game land, regional event.

pack_summary: This 10-workout pack focuses on Durability, TT Threshold, and Gravel Specific to prepare you for 75 miles of coastal plain gravel in Southeast North Carolina (Holly Shelter Game Land).
